item.title: Circle Illusion: The Perceptual Phenomenon of Size Around a Central Circle
item.description: This article discusses the circle illusion, where two identical central circles appear different in size due to surrounding visual context. Built with LaTeX TikZ, this article provides a complete explanation of the code structure and perceptual science behind it.

item.title: The Circle Illusion: Between Geometry and Visual Perception
item.description: This article explores how an arrangement of squares can form a rotating circular illusion using LaTeX and TikZ. We will examine the structure of the code, the visual principles behind the illusion, and its significance in perception and visual art.
